meanings.definition: Twisting or bending out of shape
meanings.sent1: The contortive tree branches reached in all directions.
meanings.sent2: The contortive wire was difficult to straighten.
meanings.sent3: The contortive balloon animal looked more like a twisted pretzel.
meanings.sent4: Her contortive dance moves amazed the audience.
meanings.sent5: The contortive road ahead seemed impossible to navigate.

meanings.definition: Causing twisting or bending out of shape
meanings.sent1: The contortive exercises strained his muscles.
meanings.sent2: The contortive machine reshaped the metal into intricate designs.
meanings.sent3: The contortive yoga pose made everyone giggle.
meanings.sent4: His contortive instructions led to a tangled mess.
meanings.sent5: The contortive puzzle required creative problem-solving.

meanings.definition: Involving twisting or bending out of shape
meanings.sent1: The contortive path through the woods was challenging.
meanings.sent2: The contortive design of the building was unique.
meanings.sent3: The contortive story plot kept twisting unexpectedly.
meanings.sent4: The contortive logic of the puzzle game was intriguing.
meanings.sent5: The contortive journey tested their flexibility.
